name: Chicken Tsunami (deza_games)
description:
This project was created by Zeenoh Inc. I was a part of the team when I was taking up my OJT semester, though I'm not the major programmer of this game, but I really did my best to do my part. My contribution to the the games was the Sky Level, Shop feature, Missions Feature and other level designs in this game. 

Play as Cuckoo as he collects CORNS and his companions to run to the course as enemies blocks you for achieving a High Score :)

Note: I do not own this game :)
